      • readFromFile

        public void readFromFile(java.lang.String path)
        Reads information from file and either performs instructions or adds new records precondition: path must be to a valid and properly formatted file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file being read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws exception if file does cannot be read
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws exception if file is not found at the given path

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile(java.lang.String path)
        Writes current list of items to file at indicated path
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file to be written to
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - throws exception if the file path does not exist or cannot be written to

      • sellItem

        public void sellItem(AudioFormat record,
                     int quantity)
        Deducts the given quantity of a record if given quantity > available quantity
        Parameters:
        record - the record being purchased
        quantity - the quantity of the given record being purchased

      • addItem

                    int quantity,

        Adds a new item or updates an existed item to the list of items
        Parameters:
        record - the record being added
        quantity - the number of the record being added
        price - the price of the record being added

        Returns:
